thread.title: Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
thread.title_full: Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up

title: Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-wise Break Up
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Saturday, October 17, 2015, 13:21 [IST] 
Ram Charan's Bruce Lee The Fighter , released yesterday amidst fans galore and huge expectations. But has however, opened to mixed response from general audience. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
The film was released in more than 220 locations in USA and many shows were cancelled due to less occupancy and has collected only $ K from premieres, which is a shock to trade pundits too. 
Nevertheless, Bruce Lee has collected a share of 12.66 in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana on it's day 1, despite the bad word of mouth while the gross is 16.55 Cr. 
Bruce Lee opening day collections marks the highest of Ram Charan career and third best in TFI after Baahubali and Srimanthudu. 
The film was estimated to cross Mahesh Babu's Srimanthudu records and stand as the all time record next to Baahubali. 
Though it did not completely achieve its target, Bruce Lee manged to cross Srimanthudu day 1 share in Ceeded, Nellore, Guntur and Vizag. 
Check out Bruce Lee first day box office collections are wise break of AP and TS shares in the slides below. Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 1/9 
Bruce Day 1 Nizam share: 3.25 Cr Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 2/9 
Bruce Lee day 1 Ceeded share: 2.45 Cr (Non Baahubali record) Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 3/9 
Bruce Lee day 1 Vizag share: 1.23 Cr (Non Baahubali Record). Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 4/9 
Bruce Lee day 1 Nellore share: 0.61 Cr (Non Baahubali Record). Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 5/9 
Bruce Lee day 1 Guntur share: 1.72 Cr(Non Baahubali Record) Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 6/9 
Krishna day 1 share: 0.75 Cr Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 7/9 
East Godavari day 1 share: 1.32 Cr Bruce Lee Day 1(Opening) Box Office Collections, Area-Wise 8/9 
West Godavari day 1 share: 1.33 Cr You might like
